t=int(raw_input())
asc='abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
while t:
    t-=1
    sd={}
    cost=0
    s=raw_input()
    for i in s:
        if i in asc:
            if i not in sd.keys():
                sd[i]=1
            else:
                sd[i]+=1
    for i in sd.keys():
        if sd[i]%2==0:
            cost+=sd[i]/2
        else:
            cost+=sd[i]/2 + 1
    print(cost)
